bug.author: Frankdog
bug.summary: depthToSpace dataformat comparison not conside about lower case letters may raise exception when use pretrained model by python
bug.description:
To get help from the community, check out our <denchmark-link:https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!forum/tfjs>Google group</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
in html <denchmark-code><script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tensorflow/tfjs@0.14.1/dist/tf.min.js"></script> </denchmark-code>
converter <denchmark-code>tensorflowjs_converter --version Using TensorFlow backend.
tensorflowjs 0.6.7
Dependency versions: keras 2.2.2 tensorflow 1.12.0 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
chrome Version 71.0.3578.98 (Official Build) (64-bit) <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tensorflow/tfjs@0.14.1/node_modules/@tensorflow/tfjs-core/src/ops/array_ops.ts
function depthToSpace_ <denchmark-code> const inputHeight = (dataFormat === 'NHWC') ? $x.shape[1] : $x.shape[2]; const inputWidth = (dataFormat === 'NHWC') ? $x.shape[2] : $x.shape[3]; const inputDepth = (dataFormat === 'NHWC') ? $x.shape[3] : $x.shape[1]; </denchmark-code>
the compare does not consider about lower case letters. in my case:
pretrained model by tensorflow 1.6 (pythonï¼‰ convert to tensorflow js model by tensorflowjs_converter the input shape is (10,48,48,9) and the dataFormat is nhwc (which is in lower case) but then compare use (dataFormat === 'NHWC') will cause inputDepth = x.shape[1] = 48 and may raise exception
<denchmark-code>uncaught (in promise) Error: Dimension size must be evenly divisible by 9 but is 48 for depthToSpace with input shape 10,48,48,9 at assert (util.ts:81) at depthToSpace_ (array_ops.ts:1083) at depthToSpace (operation.ts:46) at executeOp$15 (transformation_executor.ts:85) at executeOp$16 (operation_executor.ts:81) at graph_executor.ts:168 at engine.ts:156 at e.scopedRun (engine.ts:167) at e.tidy (engine.ts:153) at e.tidy (environment.ts:186) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h4>Code to reproduce the bug / link to feature request</denchmark-h>
see detail above

comments.comment: Related PR has been merged , so closing this issue.
